column2: VARDESC
Could you please describe to me, what happened when you fell on [DATE OF FALL].
What were you doing (when you fell)?
Where were you (exactly) when you fell?
Did the fall happen inside, or outside?
[IF INSIDE FALL] Was the surface of the ground (floor) that you fell on wet or dry?  [IF OUTSIDE FALL] Was the surface of the ground (floor) that you fell on wet, dry, icy, or have snow?
When you fell, did you slip or trip on something (such as table leg, irregularity in floor or sidewalk surface, step, curb, ladder, clothing, or pet)? RECORD YES OR NO.
Did you fall all the way fall to the floor, ground or other lower level when you fell?
column17: 0 = No, participant did not fall to the ground [GO TO Q3]
column18: 1 = Yes, participant fell all the way to the ground [GO TO Q3]

column2: What type of shoes were you wearing (if any) when you fell?

column26: 10 = Work boot or other boot with shoelaces

column2: What type of shoes were you wearing (if any) when you fell?

column20: 4 = More than 6 blocks (½ mile) away from your home?
